CSSFont-variant-emoji.summary: The font-variant-emoji CSS property specifies the default presentation style for displaying emojis.

remarks.para: Traditionally, this was done by appending a Variation Selector, U+FE0E for text and U+FE0F for emoji, to the emoji code point. Only emojis listed as contributing to a Unicode emoji presentation sequence are affected by this property.
